gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Every corner tells a story of sophistication and comfort.

testimonials.text: "Perfect location in the Historic Center of Cartagena and a spectacular 2-story deluxe room."
testimonials.author: Polishing

testimonials.text: "The best experience in a boutique hotel in Cartagena. Excellent location near the Plaza de Santo Domingo, nice facilities, comfortable and no noise."
testimonials.author: Manuela

testimonials.text: "Perfect location to get to know Cartagena. The hotel staff is very attentive. Exquisite breakfast served in the loft style room."
testimonials.author: Beatriz

testimonials.text: "The best medieval and modern hotel in Cartagena. Location 10/10 in the historic heart, spacious, clean room and beautifully designed."
testimonials.author: Katherine

testimonials.text: "Beautiful colonial hotel in Cartagena de Indias. Modern facilities, very well located and unbeatable staff treatment."
testimonials.author: Saul

testimonials.text: "An unforgettable trip in this hotel in the historic center. Rustic-luxurious design unique in Cartagena, the duplex rooms are a marvel."
testimonials.author: Diego

list.description: Our duplex rooms combine the original architecture of the house with a two-level layout that provides character and privacy. On the upper level is the bedroom, equipped with bed, TV and minibar, creating an intimate and secluded space. The lower level has a social lounge area, private bathroom and a fully equipped bar area, ideal for relaxing inside the room. The private balcony opens to the alley, allowing you to enjoy the ambiance of the Historic Center from an elevated and quiet spot. It is an ideal option for those looking for an authentic experience, with natural light, colonial details and a direct connection to the city.

list.titleBottom: WITHOUT VIEW WITH LARGE LIVING ROOM
list.description: This duplex room offers a spacious and quiet layout, perfect for extended stays or for those looking for a quiet space to work and rest. The room is organized on two levels: on the upper level is the bedroom with bed, TV and minibar, while the lower level has a generous living room, ideal for reading, working or relaxing, as well as a private bathroom and a fully equipped bar area. Although it does not have an exterior view, its spaciousness, high ceilings and warm finishes create a cozy and serene atmosphere. It is an excellent alternative for those who prioritize comfort, silence and interior space.

services: Ideal for long stays or for work
Bedroom on the upper level with bed, TV and minibar
Spacious living room on the lower level

list.description: Our suite is designed to offer maximum comfort on a single level, without stairs, facilitating a comfortable and fluid experience. Both the sleeping area and the social space are on the same floor, making it the most accessible and practical option in the hotel. It has a king-size bed and a spacious layout that favors tranquility and relaxation. Since it does not have an exterior view, the suite offers a quieter and more private environment. It has a private bathroom and a fully equipped bar area, ideal to fully relax after a day exploring the city.

footer.description: An architectural jewel in the heart of Cartagena de Indias, where medieval luxury meets modern comfort for an unforgettable stay.
